metaTags.metaDescription: Filter, inspect, and isolate Internet traffic with Cloudflare's Secure Web Gateway (SWG). Block ransomware, phishing, and other malware. Discover how.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare named in 2024 Gartner Magic Quadrant for SV-SASE. Announcement >

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Gateway
relatedBlades.subtitle: A cloud-native, low-latency Secure Web Gateway (SWG)
relatedBlades.copy: With visibility into approximately 20% of the web, Cloudflare's unmatched network scale protects employee Internet browsing and blocks breach-causing threats.

columnContent.title: Accelerate user Internet access
columnContent.description: No more traffic backhauling. Our single-pass inspection is [50% faster](https://blog.cloudflare.com/network-performance-update-cio-edition/?_ga=2.241337794.1947644748.1710771073-1224524116.1709647459) than SWG alternatives.

columnContent.title: Block known and unknown threats
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's DNS and HTTP telemetry and threat detection models catch more risks.

columnContent.title: Monitor traffic across your network
columnContent.description: Stack in-line [Zero Trust services](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) to provide holistic Internet traffic visibility across users, devices, and locations.

columnContent.title: Easy implementation and management
columnContent.description: Streamline policy building and auditing with predefined categories.

relatedBlades.title: Inspect browser traffic from our global network
relatedBlades.copy:
Our Secure Web Gateway runs everywhere in Cloudflare's global network, letting you inspect traffic wherever employees work. 

It also runs in-line with our [data loss prevention](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/products/dlp/) and [remote browser isolation](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/products/browser-isolation/)  offering secure browsing with no disruptions.

relatedBlades.title: Learn how Gateway works within Cloudflare's SASE platform

content.value: "Algolia is growing pretty fast. We needed a way to have visibility across our corporate network without slowing things down for our employees. Gateway gave us a simple way to do that."
Director of Infrastructure & Security  Adam Surak

columnContent.title: Protect against phishing and ransomware
columnContent.description: Block attacks with proactive filtering and inspection policies across many security categories.

columnContent.title: Secure distributed remote offices
columnContent.description: Protect office users across any location with DNS filtering or more advanced inspections.

columnContent.title: Protect remote workers
columnContent.description: Keep users safe on the open web, regardless of where they work.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore use cases

relatedBlades.title: Helping organizations worldwide progress towards Zero Trust
relatedBlades.description: Helping organizations worldwide progress towards Zero Trust

relatedBlades.title: Threat protection features across full Zero Trust platform

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Essential security controls to keep employees and apps protected online. Best for teams under 50 users, or proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Protects access to anything on your network and the Internet. Best for teams over 50 users that do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations that want security transformation backed by maximum support, visibility, connectivity and interoperability.

features.name: Comprehensive security categories
features.description:
Block by ransomware, phishing, DGA domains, DNS tunneling, 
C2 & botnet, and more.
